item.title: Heavy rain forecast for Raichur, district on high alert
item.description:
<![CDATA[
Raichur: Local administration has heightened vigilance in Raichur district, after IMD predicted heavy rainfall in the upcoming days. Deputy commissioner Nitish K, also heading the district disaster management authority, directed officials to implement preventive measures against potential heavy rainfall and flooding in the region.He emphasised that officials at district, taluk, hobli, and gram panchayat levels must prepare for intense rain and floods. They are required to maintain their pres...]]>
item.author: Tnn
